content: i wrote this pattern as i made a jacket for little gustave so that i would be able to replicate it should he need another i hope that it can be of use to others that also haven t been able to find decently fitting jacket unfortunately i was only able to write it in the one size as i didn t have any other daxies to compare it to but i m assuming gustave is average sized not overly small or big as i have indicated on the pattern changing your needle size up or down should give you a little leeway between sizes the yarn i used was elle pullskein in the colour royal but any dk yarn should work well i used 3mm circular needles a yarn needle for sewing in ends and scissors i used just under one 100g ball approx 300m / 330yds
